overview: This is a rare classic movie from the eighties and features hall of fame starlets Ebony Ayes and Jeannie Pepper! Ebony and Jeannie star as two enterprising young ladies who start their own stripping telegram service --- with a very special touch! Soon their sex lives are as full as their bank accounts! This movie is a real blast from the past and Jeannie Pepper and Ebony Ayes really blaze up this video!
title: Black Chicks In Heat
